利用等候区作为促进健康素养的场所研究人员回顾了初级保健或门诊医疗服务的等候区如何提高健康素养。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/The-use-of-waiting-areas-as-a-place-to-contribute-to-the-health-literacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/The-use-of-waiting-areas-as-a-place-to-contribute-to-the-health-literacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59a42313-7fbb-4f90-ad30-a45e25f0dfda Wed, 19 Jul 2023 05:52:00 -0400 The use of waiting areas as a place to contribute to health literacy
SARS-CoV-2刺突蛋白在肺损伤中的作用被揭示：发现了有希望的新方法研究人员研究了 SARS-CoV-2 刺突 (S) 蛋白亚基 1 (S1) 对肺内皮的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/SARS-CoV-2-spike- Proteins-role-in-lung-injury-unraveled-promising-new-approach-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/SARS-CoV-2-spike- Proteins-role-in-lung-injury-unraveled-promising-new-approach-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2a0272a-2734-4a05-9ac7-868357629cba Wed, 19 Jul 2023 05:10:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 spike protein's role in lung injury unraveled: promising new approach uncovered

研究表明，绝经期女性对团体咨询的大力支持：这是改善生活质量的一个有希望的一步研究通过审视女性的观点和经历，调查了更年期对女性健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Research-reveals-overwhelming-support-for-group-consultations-among-women-experiencing-menopause-a-promising-step-towards-improving-quality- of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Research-reveals-overwhelming-support-for-group-consultations-among-women-experiencing-menopause-a-promising-step-towards-improving-quality- of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b3a9696-d41e-4c4a-b3b4-6fe730724201 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 04:19:00 -0400 Research reveals overwhelming support for group consultations among women experiencing menopause: a promising step towards improving quality of life
人工智能和感染控制：预防传染病爆发和流行病研究人员讨论了人工智能（AI）在预防传染病爆发和未来流行病方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/AI-and-infection-control-preventing-infectious-disease-outbreaks-and-pandemics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/AI-and-infection-control-preventing-infectious-disease-outbreaks-and-pandemics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed8c4bf0-f644-4742-a946-b9c869422c0e Wed, 19 Jul 2023 03:32:00 -0400 AI and infection control: preventing infectious disease outbreaks and pandemics
用于监测阿尔茨海默病进展的机器学习方法研究人员评估了多维机器学习方法用于监测阿尔茨海默病进展的预测价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/A-machine-learning-approach-for-monitoring-the-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/A-machine-learning-approach-for-monitoring-the-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2ed7f4f-49f1-4a16-b6e6-e8d11960b176 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 02:35:00 -0400 A machine-learning approach for monitoring the progression of Alzheimer's disease
深入了解提供危险材料安全转移的转移系统在本次采访中，AZoM 向 Quattroflow 介绍了可以安全传输危险材料的传输系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Insights-into-transfer-systems-providing-safe-transfer-of-hazardous-materials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Insights-into-transfer-systems-providing-safe-transfer-of-hazardous-materials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fadce691-1dca-4662-9e4e-9ca9324a6344 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 02:03:00 -0400 Insights into transfer systems providing safe transfer of hazardous materials
饮食和锻炼如何改善老年癌症幸存者的心理和身体功能迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心和波士顿达纳法伯癌症研究所的研究人员获得了总计 700 万美元的资助，用于研究饮食和锻炼如何影响老年癌症幸存者及其护理人员的心理和身体功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/How-diet-exercise-can-improve-mental-and-physical-functioning-in-older-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/How-diet-exercise-can-improve-mental-and-physical-functioning-in-older-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49545346-a7c8-4e6e-a53d-863c0dbbd123 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 23:53:13 -0400 How diet, exercise can improve mental and physical functioning in older cancer survivors
芬太尼过量逆转：地平线上的新希望根据疾病控制中心的数据，每年有 100,000 名美国人死于服药过量，其中大部分是由于使用芬太尼等合成阿片类药物所致。虽然纳洛酮是目前阿片类药物过量的唯一解毒剂，已变得越来越常见，但它对芬太尼类合成阿片类药物的效果较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Fentanyl-overdose-reversal-New-hope-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Fentanyl-overdose-reversal-New-hope-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57aa257d-c4df-48a1-a868-aba0f9a2d10b Tue, 18 Jul 2023 23:05:15 -0400 Fentanyl overdose reversal: New hope on the horizon
双相情感障碍与过早死亡风险增加相关，尤其是因外部原因导致的过早死亡患有双相情感障碍的人-；发表在开放获取期刊《BMJ Mental Health》上的研究发现，以极端情绪波动为特征的人因事故、暴力和自杀等外部原因提前死亡的可能性是没有这种情况的人的 6 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Bipolar-disorder-linked-with-increased-risk-of-early-death-pspecially-from-external-causes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Bipolar-disorder-linked-with-increased-risk-of-early-death-pspecially-from-external-causes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b71d52fc-eaa7-4587-aa02-d30173bb2d72 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 22:54:33 -0400 Bipolar disorder associated with increased risk of early death, particularly from external causes
